ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
"The Lovers' Card" In this issue Tarot is torn between two Lovers, Boo Cat and the Skeleton Man. Internal pressures force her to choose between them. Also, the return of the vampire Licorice Dust. Find out what dark place she has been lurking in for the past year.
